game.title: Dandara: Trials of Fear Edition
game.description: Dandara is a unique metroidvania platformer set in a surreal, gravity-defying world. You play as Dandara, a brave heroine who must restore balance to a oppressed world by battling enemies and exploring a non-linear dreamlike world with innovative movement mechanics.

specifications.languages: English, Español, Português, Français, Deutsch, Русский, 中文

achievements.name: Trophies Coming Soon
achievements.description: Trophies for this game will be added in the future
